abstract: An advisory panel's report on the staff resources that will be needed for New York State to monitor such natural gas drilling had been due next week, but the deadline has been extended to next February.
snippet: An advisory panel's report on the staff resources that will be needed for New York State to monitor such natural gas drilling had been due next week, but the deadline has been extended to next February.
lead_paragraph: In a sign that New York State may have to slow down a bit before authorizing a new kind of natural gas drilling, an advisory panel is delaying its recommendations on how the state should pay for new staff members to enforce regulations on the drilling operations.

headline.main: N.Y. Advisory Panel Delays Report on Fracking
